channel.title: CVE Feed for jettison -- jettison
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jettison -- jettison

item.title: CVE-2022-40150|2024-08-03T12:14:39.669Z -- jettison -- jettison
item.description: Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by Out of memory. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-40149|2024-08-03T12:14:39.950Z -- jettison -- jettison
item.description: Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stackoverflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.
